definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: By late 1952, the Korean War had been going on for more than two years.
sentences.chinese: 到1952年年底，朝鮮戰爭已經持續了兩年多。

sentences.english: Most of the fighting in the Korean War took place along the geographic line known as the thirty-eighth parallel.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮戰爭中，大多戰役發生在人們所熟知的三八線上。

sentences.english: And actually Takeshima was taken from Japan during the Korean War.
sentences.chinese: 實際，竹島是在朝鮮戰爭中從日本被奪走的。

sentences.english: Then the end of the Korean War produced another spasm of reappraisal.
sentences.chinese: 後來，朝鮮戰爭的結束引起了又一次重新評價的熱潮。

sentences.english: During the Korean War, a probe-and-drogue system was developed.
sentences.chinese: 在朝鮮戰爭期間，出現了一套探頭錐管系統。

sentences.english: The ruined bridge si a relic of the Korean War in 1950.
sentences.chinese: 這座譭棄的橋是1950年朝鮮戰爭的遺蹟。

sentences.english: Servo was swamped with rush order for the Korean war.
sentences.chinese: 塞爾伏爲了朝鮮戰爭的緊急定貨單忙得要死。

sentences.english: 1950 - The beginning of the Korean War.
The question sparks an anecdote about the Korean war.
sentences.chinese: 這一話題激起關於朝鮮戰爭的討論。

sentences.english: The Korean War is an important event in the 20(superscript th) century international politics.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮戰爭是20世紀國際關係史上的重要事件。

sentences.english: Pyongyang was the center of Christian activity before the Korean War.
sentences.chinese: 在朝鮮戰爭前，平壤是基督教徒的活動中心。

definition: to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
